channel.title: [3ds] Realistic Katana Model [LOOK]
channel.description:
Well, after seeing dylan's very nice version, i attempted my own with 3ds max. I posted a few pics on his topic a few hours ago, but i have made several changes to it since, mainly related to the materials.
I may update this topic with some more swords, if i get round to making any.
The blade is sharp btw, as sharp as it can be, it's just the lighting and the specular settings which cause it to darken around the edges, therefore making it look rounded.
Meh, comment on the wood if you want, but i only really put it there to show the shadowing.
[IMG]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Katana1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Katana2-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Katana3-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Katana4.png[/img]
Criticism is highly appreciated.

item.title: [3ds] Realistic Katana Model [LOOK]
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:27, topic:286132”][quote author=Assassins Creed Fan link=topic=378445.msg2849508#msg2849508 date=1246464459]
CJ, 1 tip for the purple light.
On the floor it is all the same, not like the Light/Lamp itself.
Fade the ground out like you did with the Light/Lamp
[/quote]

That’s because i used one purple light, and one grey light, yes, grey light, lol.
I asked this guy on msn, forgot who, what colours i should try the room with, and he said purple and black, tried that, didn’t look too good, then i tried purple and grey and that’s what happened. xD[/quote]Fair Enough

Read full topic

@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:25, topic:286132”]CJ, 1 tip for the purple light.
On the floor it is all the same, not like the Light/Lamp itself.
Fade the ground out like you did with the Light/Lamp :P[/quote]

That’s because i used one purple light, and one grey light, yes, grey light, lol.
I asked this guy on msn, forgot who, what colours i should try the room with, and he said purple and black, tried that, didn’t look too good, then i tried purple and grey and that’s what happened. xD

item.title: [3ds] Realistic Katana Model [LOOK]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

But i like it dark. ;p

And ok, i’ll find some.
Need to learn how to do a brushed metal material. :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 29-06-2009, 16:37:25[/size][hr][quote=“jjones10, post:9, topic:286132”]The handle and the hilt are incredible in my opinion. Awesome job there. Great texture selection

However, the blade looks good SHAPE wise. The texture is the only thing that kills it. http://mayang.com/textures/Metal/images/Flat%20Metal%20Textures/scratched_metal_texture_5132552.JPG I think that would look pretty sweet on it.

Other than that, amazing.[/quote]

LOL, that is the exact texture i used.

Read full topic

item.title: [3ds] Realistic Katana Model [LOOK]
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

The handle and the hilt are incredible in my opinion. Awesome job there. Great texture selection

However, the blade looks good SHAPE wise. The texture is the only thing that kills it. http://mayang.com/textures/Metal/images/Flat%20Metal%20Textures/scratched_metal_texture_5132552.JPG I think that would look pretty sweet on it.

Other than that, amazing.

Read full topic

Very nice start. Id look up some tutorials on rendering but other than that the model is superb. Although the handle is a little box like
[/quote]

Hmm, okay, i’m give it a go at rounding it.
What part of rendering, the shadows, or what?

Thanks a lot though. :)[/quote]
Give the metal parts more reflection and make the scene less dark.

item.title: [3ds] Realistic Katana Model [LOOK]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

alright,
the blade texture is horrible imo, i can see where it restarts. the hilt texture is too… unsuitable. its just lines, and i see where it restarts. i like the rayskin textre but rayskins black. the handle seems like a rectangle. and the handle (not rayskin) should have the same texture as the blade, as the handle base is just the tang from the blade with fabric over it. the pummel is a little too sharp-edged. round it a bit.
its a great V1.

Read full topic
